Like many of the UK population I feel that the current Justice System for certain crimes is not tough enough and a prison sentence alone is not enough to be warranted as punishment.

This leads me on to the purpose of the e-petition as stated. It is time to bring back Capital Punishment (death penalty).

In my opinion a life sentence for murdering someone is not enough whatsoever. many murderers will get a life sentence which is then reduced and the murderer is let out back into society. this is unacceptable.

if a murder is committed, the murderer has lost any rights he/she had.

Bringing back the death penalty would reduce crime such as murders and give out a statement that once the offence is commited you have lost your rights and life.
